episodes.title: Tia Levings: Pretty Furious about the Trad Wife Phenomenon
episodes.description: Tia Levings, author of 'A Well-Trained Wife', joins Mallory Hagan and Maggie Gehlsen-Burnett to talk about the intersections of Christian nationalism, the Tradwife movement, and the impact of religious trauma on women's rights, and personal autonomy. They explore the importance of education, visibility in activism, and the journey of healing from oppressive systems. Tia shares her personal experiences and insights on reclaiming individuality, the role of therapy, and the dangers of purity culture, while emphasizing the need for women to support each other in navigating these challenges. Pretty Furious Pod is hosted by Maggie Gehlsen-Burnett and Mallory Hagan. Our mission is to validate the female experience, challenge societal norms, and drive conversation about newsworthy topics plaguing the modern woman’s world. Through impactful conversations and humor, we aim to inspire our audience to use the most powerful force in the world to drive meaningful change: their anger.
